# ChartDepth - LLM Navigation Index

> Plateforme de signaux trading IA - Projet Solo Bootstrap

## Quick Facts
- Stack: Next.js 14 + Supabase + Stripe + Vercel
- Budget: 15-100€ initial
- Objectif: MRR 2,500€ en 12 mois
- Status: Phase 1 - Préparation

## Documentation Index

### Project Management
- [CLAUDE.md](CLAUDE.md): Instructions principales pour Claude Code
- [PROJECT_TRACKER.md](PROJECT_TRACKER.md): Suivi des tâches en cours
- [HUMAN_ACTIONS.md](HUMAN_ACTIONS.md): Actions nécessitant intervention humaine

- [.claude/INDEX.md](.claude/INDEX.md): Index central du knowledge base

- [.claude/knowledge/FEATURES.md](.claude/knowledge/FEATURES.md): Spécifications fonctionnelles MVP
- [.claude/knowledge/WORKFLOWS.md](.claude/knowledge/WORKFLOWS.md): Processus et routines

## Key Concepts

### Business Model
- Free tier: 1 signal/jour, délai 24h
- Pro tier: 19€/mois, tous signaux, temps réel

### 5 MVP Instruments
1. EUR/USD (Forex)
2. GBP/USD (Forex)
3. XAU/USD (Gold)
4. BTC/USD (Crypto)
5. US30 (Index)

### Technical Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui
- Backend: Supabase (PostgreSQL, Auth, Storage)
- Payments: Stripe
- Hosting: Vercel
- Charts: TradingView Widget

### Project Phases
1. Préparation (S1-S2): Setup technique
2. MVP Core (S3-S6): Landing, Auth, Dashboard, Signals
3. Paiements (S7-S10): Stripe, Emails, Subscriptions
4. Admin & Polish (S11-S14): Admin UI, Stats, Deploy

## For Claude Code

### Session Start Protocol
1. Read CLAUDE.md
2. Read .claude/progress/MASTER.md
3. Check PROJECT_TRACKER.md for current tasks
4. Check HUMAN_ACTIONS.md for blockers

### Session End Protocol
1. Update .claude/progress/MASTER.md
2. Update PROJECT_TRACKER.md
3. Add to HUMAN_ACTIONS.md if needed
4. Summarize progress

### File Conventions
- Specs: .claude/knowledge/*.md
- Decisions: .claude/adr/NNN-*.md
- Progress: .claude/progress/*.md
- Memory: .claude/memory/*.md
